Question: Also in this period, this person gained a reputation for being distant, cold, and withdrawn, and for having a quick temper.
Hints: This person was then arrested and taken to jail where he was charged with feloniously assaulting an officer.
This person considered releasing an entire album of pop songs and recorded dozens of them, but the idea was scrapped.
Most of this person' associates at the time—some perhaps imitating Charlie Parker—had drug addictions of their own.
